post.author: 김태희
post.content:
C++ Developer with Java experience
About the Job
C++ Developer/Java

One of our clients in the downtown area is looking for a C++/Java Developer to work on a Portal Project  migrating existing application functionality to web services.
In this role, you will be developing with C++ 75% of the time and the other 25% with Java. You will
reverse engineer/refactor existing code to understand and migrate/rebuild functionality as web services on to a J2EE platform. The ideal candidate will have experience working within the financial services industry; have experience with RogueWave and Corba; have experience developing on a Windows environment; and have good communication skills.

If interested, please forward your resume in word format to j enriquez@integritycanada.com
post.title: C++ Developer with Java experience
